title: Types
fullText:
Materials and dimensions of earth electrodes shall be selected to withstand corrosion and to have adequate mechanical strength.

Note: Consideration should be given to the nature of the soil and environmental conditions.

Earth electrodes shall be of a type and shall be installed in accordance with Table 5.2.

Exception: Conductive reinforcement of:
• (a) concrete foundations embedded directly in the soil; or
• (b) concrete foundations of a building or floor slab in contact with the ground and not impeded by a continuous insulating barrier, may be used in lieu of an electrode specified in Table 5.2.
